label: ball
caption: A playful brown dog runs around in the lush green grass of a backyard, its tail wagging excitedly as it chases after a pink ball that has bounced away from it. The warm sunlight casts a golden glow over the scene, illuminating the vibrant colors of the ball and the dog's fur as they play together on this sunny afternoon. A few scattered leaves and twigs are kicked up by the dog's paws as it bounds through the yard, its joyful energy infectious.
